extension.description: Die Kodi Version muss mindestens 17 sein !

Zippt alle Kodi Addons in und extern !
Nur ungezippte Addons ! Passt den Addon Ordner Namen an die Addon ID an falls dieser nicht mit der Addon ID gleich ist !
Hardware - Software - Kodi - DE https://www.facebook.com/groups/hskde/

Multi-emulator front-end and general application launcher for Kodi. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROM sets and also supports scrapping ROM metadata and artwork online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro or Redump XML DAT files. Launching of games and standalone applications is also available.
extension.news: See changelog.txt for information about the latest release.

extension.disclaimer: For Kodi Helix/Gotham/Frodo/Eden/Dharma
extension.summary: Lancer n'importer quelle application depuis Kodi.
extension.description: Advanced Launcher erlaubt das Starten beliebiger Linux, Windows und OS X Anwendungen (mit oder ohne Kommandozeile) direkt aus der Kodi Oberfläche. Advanced Launcher erlaubt weiterhin das Editieren, Herunterladen und Verwalten der Metadaten (Informationen und Bilder) für diese Anwendungen aus dem Internet.

Advanced Launcher allows you to start any Linux, Windows and OS X applications (with command line support or not) directly from the Kodi GUI. Advanced Launcher also give you the possibility to edit, download (from Internet resources) and manage all the meta-data (informations and images) related to these applications.

Advanced Launcher позволяет запускать любые приложения Linux, Windows и OS X (с поддержкой командной строки или нет) непосредственно из Коди GUI. Advanced Launcher также даст вам возможность редактировать, загружать (из интернет-ресурсов) и управлять всеми мета-данными (информация и изображения), связанными с этими приложениями.

Advanced Launcher permet de lancer toutes les applications Linux, Windows and OS X (avec support des lignes de commandes ou non) directement depuis l'interface de Kodi. Advanced Launcher offre également la possibilité de modifier, télécharger (depuis les ressoures web) et de gérer toues les meta-donées (informations et images) relatives à ces applications.
Advanced Launcherilla voit käynnistää Kodi:n käyttöliittymästä mitä tahansa sovelluksia. Käynnistettävistä sovelluksista voi hakea tietoja ja kuvia Internet-tietokannoista.

extension.disclaimer: For Kodi Helix/Gotham/Frodo/Eden/Dharma
extension.summary: Lancer n'importer quelle application depuis Kodi.
extension.description: Advanced Launcher erlaubt das Starten beliebiger Linux, Windows und OS X Anwendungen (mit oder ohne Kommandozeile) direkt aus der Kodi Oberfläche. Advanced Launcher allows you to start any Linux, Windows and OS X applications (with command line support or not) directly from the Kodi GUI. Advanced Launcher also give you the possibility to edit, download (from Internet resources) and manage all the meta-data (informations and images) related to these applications.

Advanced Launcher permet de lancer toutes les applications Linux, Windows and OS X (avec support des lignes de commandes ou non) directement depuis l'interface de Kodi. Advanced Launcher offre également la possibilité de modifier, télécharger (depuis les ressoures web) et de gérer toues les meta-donées (informations et images) relatives à ces applications.

Mit dem Kodi Repository Generator kann man ganz einfach eine eigene Kodi Repository erstellen ! Ein Kodi Repository-Addon Beispiel( Rohling )ist mit enthalten ! Die genaue Anleitung ist im Changelog des Addons zu finden !
Der Kodi Repository Generator ist auf das Addon - Kodi Addon Zipper - von Loki1979 - abgestimmt !

Easily Factory Restore your Kodi Configuration in One Simple Click! This tool will bring your Kodi back to its original installation state, deleting all customizations and add-ons you may have previously enabled, giving you a fresh start!

extension.summary: This is an add-on for www.funk.net
extension.description: This add-on provides access to the German VOD platform www.funk.net. The content is only accessable from Germany.

Dieses Add-on bietet Zugriff auf die Bibliothek von www.funk.net. Hier gibt es Serien wie z.B. Fargo in FullHD, aber auch Eigenproduktionen von ARD/ZDF. Die Serien sind in der Regel nur innerhalb Deutschlands erreichbar.
extension.disclaimer: Dieses Add-on wird von keiner Sendeanstalt unterstützt und ist daher inoffiziell.

extension.summary: JoKeRzBoX's LibreELEC compilations for S905 based devices
extension.description: Thie repository contains addons compiled / ported to devices based on Amlogic S905 AARCH64 devices running LibreELEC (may also work with OpenELEC). There is no guarantee these addons will work so USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
German version of all texts used in Kodi.
Uploads your kodi.log file and returns an url you can post on http://forum.kodi.tv/

Ползвайте добавката за да управлявате операционната система, в основата на @DISTRONAME@. Чрез добавката можете да настроите всичко и така не се налага да се притеснявате какво работи под Kodi.[CR][CR]От добавката можете да променяте настройките на мрежовите връзки, клавиатурната подредба и да включвате/изключвате отдалечения достъп посредством Samba или SSH.

Utilitza aquest complement per configurar el sistema operatiu subjacent del sistema @DISTRONAME@. Des d'aquí es pot gestionar tot el sistema, de manera que no s'ha de preocupar sobre el que s'executa sota el Kodi.[CR][CR]Des d'aquí es pot canviar la connectivitat de la xarxa, la distribució del teclat i idioma i activar / desactivar l'accés remot inclòs samba i SSH.

Použijte toto rozšíření pro správu vašeho @DISTRONAME@ systému. Odtud můžete spravovat celý systém, takže nemusíte mít strach o to, co běží pod kapotou. [CR] [CR] Odtud můžete změnit připojení k síti, rozložení klávesnice, jazyk a povolit nebo zakázat vzdálený přístup, včetně Samby a SSH.

Brug denne addon til at styre dit @DISTRONAME@ systems underliggende operativsystem. Herfra kan du styre hele systemet, så du ikke behøver at bekymre dig om, hvad der kører under motorhjelmen. [CR] [CR] Herfra kan du ændre din netværksforbindelse, dit tastaturlayout og sprog og aktivere/deaktivere fjernadgang, herunder Samba og SSH.

Verwenden Sie dieses Addon, um das Betriebssystem, auf dem @DISTRONAME@ läuft, zu administrieren. Von hier aus können Sie das gesamte System verwalten ohne sich Gedanken machen zu müssen, was genau im System abläuft.[CR][CR]Hier haben Sie die Möglichkeit Netzwerkeinstellungen, Tastaturlayouts oder Systemdienste, wie SSH oder Samba, zu konfigurieren.

Χρησιμοποιήστε αυτό το πρόσθετο για να διαχειριστείτε το λειτουργικό σύστημα @DISTRONAME@. Από εδώ μπορείτε να διαχειριστείτε ολόκληρο το σύστημα ούτως ώστε να μη χρειάζεται να ανησυχείτε σχετικά με το τι τρέχει στο υπόβαθρο.[CR][CR]Μπορείτε, επίσης, να αλλάξετε τη συνδεσιμότητα του δικτύου σας, τη διάταξη του πληκτρολογίου σας και τη γλώσσα, καθώς και να ενεργοποιήσετε/απενεργοποιήσετε την απομακρυσμένη πρόσβαση μέσω Samba και SSH.

Use this addon to manage your @DISTRONAME@ system's underlying operating system. From here you can manage the entire system so you don't have to worry about what runs under the hood.[CR][CR]From here you can change your network connectivity, your keyboard layout and language and enable/disable remote access including Samba and SSH.

Use this addon to manage your @DISTRONAME@ system's underlying operating system. From here you can manage the entire system so you don't have to worry about what runs under the hood.[CR][CR]From here you can change your network connectivity, your keyboard layout and language and enable/disable remote access including Samba and SSH.

Use this addon to manage your @DISTRONAME@ system's underlying operating system. From here you can manage the entire system so you don't have to worry about what runs under the hood.[CR][CR]From here you can change your network connectivity, your keyboard layout and language and enable/disable remote access including Samba and SSH.

Use this addon to manage your @DISTRONAME@ system's underlying operating system. From here you can manage the entire system so you don't have to worry about what runs under the hood.[CR][CR]From here you can change your network connectivity, your keyboard layout and language and enable/disable remote access including Samba and SSH.
Usa este add-on para administrar el sistema @DISTRONAME@. Desde aquí podrás controlar el sistema al completo (Conexiones de red, teclado, acceso remoto, samba y SSH)

Usá esta extensión para administrar el sistema operativo subyacente a tu sistema @DISTRONAME@. Desde acá podés administrar el sistema en su totalidad sin tener que preocuparte por lo que pasa debajo del capó.[CR][CR]Desde acá podés cambiar la conexión de red, la distribución del teclado y el lenguaje y habilitar/deshabilitar el acceso remoto, incluyendo Samba y SSH.

Usa este complemento para configurar el sistema operativo de tu @DISTRONAME@. Desde aquí puedes administrar todo el sistema fácilmente.[CR][CR]Desde aquí puedes cambiar la configuración de red, distribución del teclado, lenguaje del sistema y configurar Samba y SSH para controlar el acceso remoto al sistema.

See lisa on @DISTRONAME@ operatsioonisüsteemi häälestamiseks. Siit saad hallata kogu süsteemi, ilma et oleks vaja kaane alla piiluda.[CR][CR] Siit saab seada võrguühenduse parameetreid, klaviatuuripaigutust, keelt ning lubada/keelata kaugligipääsu, sealhulgas Samba ja SSH.

Käytä tätä lisäosaa muokataksesi @DISTRONAME@in alla olevaa käyttöjärjestelmää. Täältä voit muokata koko järjestelmää välittämättä siitä, mitä konepellin alta löytyy.[CR][CR]Voit muokata verkkoasetuksia, näppäimistön tyyppiä, kieliasetuksia sekä yhteysasetuksia, mukaanlukien Samba ja SSH.

Utiliser cette extension pour configurer le système d'exploitation @DISTRONAME@. Il est possible de gérer l'intégralité du système simplement sans se soucier des détails techniques.[CR][CR]Il est possible de modifier la connexion au réseau, la disposition du clavier ou la langue du système. Il est aussi possible d'activer les accès distants comme Samba ou SSH.

Utilisez cet addiciel pour gérer le système d'exploitation sous-jacent de votre système @DISTRONAME@. D'ici vous pouvez gérer votre système au complet sans vous soucier de ce qui tourne sous la capot.[CR][CR]D'ici vous pouvez changer vos paramètres de connexion réseau, l'agencement et la langue de votre clavier et activer/désactiver l'accès distant incluant Samba et SSH.

בעזרת הרחבה זו ניתן לנהל את מערכת ההפעלה של @DISTRONAME@. מכאן ניתן לנהל כל אחד ממאפייני המערכת כך שאין צורך לדאוג מה קורה מתחת לממשק המשתמש.[CR][CR]ניתן לשנות הגדרות רשת, מערך מקלדת ושפה וגם להפעיל/לנטרל שירותי גישה מרחוק כולל Samba ו-SSH.

Koristite ovaj dodatak za upravljanje @DISTRONAME@ operativnim sustavom. Odavdje možete upravljati cijelim sustavom stoga se ne morate brinuti što je pokrenuto u pozadini.[CR][CR]Odavdje možete promijeniti mrežno povezivenje, vaš raspored tipkovnice i jezik, omogućiti/onemogućiti udaljeni pristup uključujući Sambu i SSH.

Ez a kiegészítő vezérli az @DISTRONAME@ rendszer alatti operációs rendszer beállításait. Innen kezelheti a teljes rendszert, tehát nem szükséges aggódnia mi van a motorháztető alatt. [CR][CR] Innen állíthatóak be a hálózati kapcsolatok, billentyűzet kiosztás és nyelvezet valamint a távoli hozzáférések engedélyezése/letiltása beleértve a Samba-t és SSH-t is.

Usa questo addon per gestire le impostazioni del sistema operativo di @DISTRONAME@. Da qui puoi gestire l'intero sistema senza necessità di una conoscenza avanzata del software sottostante.[CR][CR]Puoi modificare le connessioni di rete, il layout e la lingua della tastiera così come abilitare/disabilitare l'accesso remoto tramite Samba e SSH
このアドオンで@DISTRONAME@システムのオペレーティング・システムを管理します。ここからシステム全体を管理できますので、バックグラウンドで何が動作しているかなどを気にしなくてかまいません。[CR][CR]ネットワーク接続、キーボードのレイアウトや言語、SambaとSSHを含むリモートアクセスの有効・無効などの設定を行います。

Naudokite šį priedą operacines sistemos, kuris pagrįsta jūsų @DISTRONAME@ sistema, tvarkymui. Čia jūs galite valdyta visą sistemą, kad jums netektų rūpintis kas vyksta po gaubtu..[CR][CR]Čia galite pakeisti tinklo nustatymus, klaviatūros išdėstymą ir kalbą bei įjungti/išjungti nuotolinę prieigą, įskaitant Samba ir SSH.

Gebruik deze addon om het onderliggende @DISTRONAME@ systeem in te stellen. Vanaf hier kunt u het gehele systeem aanpassen, zodat u zich geen zorgen hoeft te maken over wat er onderhuids gebeurt.[CR][CR]Vanaf hier kunt u de netwerkverbindingen aanpassen, uw toetsenbord indeling en -taal, alsook een externe verbinding inclusief Samba en SSH in- of uitschakelen.

Bruk dette tillegget for å konfigurere @DISTRONAME@s underliggende operativsystem. Herfra kan du konfigurere hele systemet slik at du ikke trenger å bekymre deg om hva som skjer under panseret.[CR][CR]Du kan endre nettverksinnstillinger, tastatur, språk og aktivere eller deaktivere nettverkstilgang slik som Samba og SSH.

Za pomocą tej wtyczki możesz zarządzać systemem @DISTRONAME@. Z tego miejsca masz kontrolę nad całym systemem.[CR][CR] Zarządzasz połączeniem sieciowym, układem klawiatury i językiem systemu oraz możesz włączyć lub wyłączyć dostęp zdalny, w tym Sambę i SSH.

Utilize este addon para gerir o sistema operativo que está na base do @DISTRONAME@. Aqui pode gerir todo o sistema, para não ter de se preocupar com aquilo que se passa nos bastidores.[CR][CR] Daqui, pode alterar as suas ligações de rede, disposição do teclado e idiomas. Também pode activar/desactivar acesso remoto, incluindo Samba e SSH.

Utilize este addon para gerenciar o sistema operacional do @DISTRONAME@. Aqui você pode gerenciar todo o sistema, para não ter de se preocupar com aquilo que se passa nos bastidores.[CR][CR] Daqui, você pode alterar as suas conexões de rede, configurações do teclado e idiomas. Também pode ativar/desativar acesso remoto, incluindo compartilhamento de rede do Windows e SSH.

Данное дополнение предназначено для управления системными настройками @DISTRONAME@. С помощью удобного интерфейса Вы можете управлять настройками системы (включая низкоуровневые настройки ОС) через удобный интерфейс.[CR][CR]Здесь Вы также сможете изменить способ соединения с сетью, настроить раскладку клавиатуры, выбрать язык интерфейса, а также включить удаленный доступ по SSH и/или Samba.

Tento doplnok slúži na správu operačného systému, na ktorom beží @DISTRONAME@. Odtiaľto je možné spravovať celý systém bez nutnosti znalostí o tom, čo beží pod kapotou.[CR][CR]Je tu možné meniť sieťové nastavenia, rozloženie a jazyk klávesnice alebo povoliť/zakázať vzdialený prístup prostredníctvom Samby a SSH.

S tem dodatkom upravljate operacijski sistem, ki deluje pod pokrovom sistema @DISTRONAME@. Odtod lahko upravljate s celotnim sistemom, tako da je skrb o tem, kar teče pod pokrovom, odveč.[CR][CR]Odtod lahko spremenite svojo omrežno povezljivost, postavitev tipkovnice in jezik ter omogočite/onemogočite oddaljeni dostop, vključno s Sambo in SSH.

Använd detta tillägg för att hantera ditt @DISTRONAME@-systems underliggande operativ. Härifrån kan du hantera hela systemet så du inte behöver oroa dig för vad som körs under skalet.[CR][CR]Härifrån kan du ändra din nätverksanslutning, tangentbordslayout och språk, samt aktivera/inaktivera fjärråtkomst inklusive Samba och SSH.

Bu eklentiyi kullanarak @DISTRONAME@ sisteminizin temelindeki işletim sistemini yönetin. Buradan tüm sistemi yönetebilirsiniz ve bu yüzden sistemin altında neler olduğu hakkında endişelenmenize gerek yok.[CR][CR]Buradan ağ bağlantısı, klavye düzeni ve dilini değiştirip, Samba ve SSH gibi uzaktan erişimi etkinleştirip/devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz.

Sử dụng addon này để quản lý hệ thống điều hành @DISTRONAME@ cơ bản của bạn. Từ đây bạn có thể quản lý toàn bộ hệ thống, do đó bạn không cần phải lo lắng về những gì đang chạy . [CR][CR] Từ đây bạn có thể thay đổi kết nối mạng của bạn, bố trí bàn phím của bạn và ngôn ngữ và cho phép / vô hiệu hóa truy cập từ xa bao gồm Samba và SSH.
使用此插件管理你的 @DISTRONAME@ 系统的底层操作系统。它使你可以在无需深入了解的情况下管理整个系统。[CR][CR]在这里，你可以修改网络设置、键盘布局、语言以及启用/禁用 Samba 和 SSH 等远程访问功能。

extension.summary: Performs Rom Collection Browser startup tasks
extension.description: Some features in Rom Collection Browser require actions on XBMC startup: starting RCB after launching emulators in solo mode and scraping games on XBMC startup.
extension.platform: android freebsd ios linux osx windows

extension.summary: Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.
extension.description: The Ace reaches its second edition.[CR]Reformulated, very simple to use, with a new code that provides a lightweight and powerful skin.[CR]The Ace 2 incorporates new features such as Flexible Widgets 3nd Generation which takes the main menu's level of customization to something never seen before.[CR]Ace 2, you've never seen a skin like this.

A Ace 2 chega a sua segunda edição.[CR]Reformulada, muito simples de usar, com um novo código que proporciona uma pele leve e poderosa.[CR]Ace 2 incorpora um novo recurso chamado Widgets Flexíveis de Terceira Geração que eleva o nível de customização como você nunca viu antes.[CR]Ace 2, você nunca viu uma skin assim.

Ace 2, improved, more light and more powerful than ever.
Ace 2, melhorada, mais leve e mais poderosa do que nunca.

The traditional Aeon MQ reaches its eighth edition.[CR]Reformulated, very simple to use, with a new code that provides a lightweight and powerful skin.[CR]The Aeon MQ 8 incorporates new features such as FLEXIBLE WIDGETS 2ND GENERATION which takes the main menu's level of customization to something never seen before.[CR]Aeon MQ 8, you've never seen a skin like this.

A tradicional Aeon MQ chega a sua oitava edição.[CR]Aeon MQ 8 conta com todos os recursos presentes na versão anterior, no entanto, esses recursos foram otimizados afim de proporcionar uma experiência ainda melhor ao usuário.[CR]Aeon MQ 8 incorpora um novo recurso chamado WIDGES FLEXÍVEIS SEGUNDA GERAÇÃO que eleva o nível de customização como você nunca viu antes.[CR]Aeon MQ 8, você nunca viu uma skin assim.

extension.summary: Ein von Apple TV inspiriertes Skin für Kodi
Ένα κέλυφος για το Kodi, εμπνευσμένο από το Apple TV
A AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi
Un habillage pour Kodi inspiré de l'AppleTV
Un habillage pour Kodi inspiré d'AppleTV
Un tema para Kodi inspirado no AppleTV
Una skin per Kodi ispirata a AppleTV
애플 TV에 영감을 받은 Kodi용 스킨
Kulit yang diilham dari AppleTV untuk Kodi
Een op AppleTV geïnspireerde skin voor Kodi
Um tema para o Kodi inspirado na AppleTV
Uma Skin inspirada na Apple TV
extension.description: AppTV ist ein vom Apple TV inspiriertes Skin für Kodi. Es bietet eine sehr ressourcensparende, minimalistische Benutzeroberfläche und gleichzeitig Zugang zu den erweiterten Kodi-Funktionen, die nicht in der originalen Apple TV-Oberfläche vorhanden sind.

Το AppTV είναι ένα κέλυφος για το Kodi, εμπνευσμένο από το AppleTV. Διαθέτει ένα ιδιαίτερα ελαφρύ, μινιμαλιστικό περιβάλλον εργασίας, ενώ παρέχει πρόσβαση σε ένα πλήθος προχωρημένων λειτουργιών του Kodi που δεν είναι διαθέσιμες στο πρωτότυπο περιβάλλον του AppleTV.

AppTV is a AppleTV inspired skin for Kodi. It provides a very light weight minimalist gui while also allowing access to a number of advanced Kodi features not available in the original AppleTV interface.

AppTV est un habillage pour Kodi inspiré de l'AppleTV. Il fournit une interface minimaliste légère tout en permettant l'accès à bon nombre des caractéristiques avancées de Kodi non disponibles dans l'interface AppleTV d'origine.

AppTV est un habillage pour Kodi inspiré d'AppleTV. Il propose une IUG très légère et minimaliste tout en permettant l'accès à plusieurs fonctions avancées de Kodi qui ne sont pas proposées dans l'interface originale d'AppleTV.

AppTV è una skin ispirata a AppleTV per Kodi. Fornisce un'interfaccia molto leggera e minimalistica e permette di accedere ad alcune funzioni avanzate di Kodi non disponibili nell'interfaccia originale di AppleTV.
AppTV는 애플TV에서 영감을 받아 만든 Kodi용 스킨입니다. GUI를 최소화하여 가벼우면서도 애플TV 인터페이스에서는 사용할 수 없는 Kodi의 여러가지 고급 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.

AppTV yra AppleTV įkvėpta teminė išvaizda, skirta Kodi. Ji suteikia labai lengvą, minimalistinę grafinę vartotojo sąsają, tuo pačiu suteikiant galimybę naudoti daugelį pažangių Kdi funkcijų, kurių nėra originalioje AppleTV sąsajoje.

AppTV adalah kulit yang diilham dari AppleTV untuk Kodi. Ia menyediakan gui minimalis yang sangat ringkas juga membolehkan capaian ke beberapa fitur lanjutan Kodi yang tidak tersedia dalam antaramuka AppleTV yang asal.

AppTV is een op AppleTV geïnspireerde skin voor Kodi. het voorziet in een zeer lichtgewichte minimalistische gui terwijl eveneens toegang is tot een aantal geavanceerde Kodi features die niet beschikbaar zijn in de orginele AppleTV interface.

ApplTV jest skórą inspirowaną wyglądem interfejsu AppleTV. Dostarcza wyjątkowo lekki i minimalistyczny interfejs użytkownika umożliwiający dostęp do wielu zaawansowanych funkcji Kodi, niedostępnych w oryginalnym interfejsie AppleTV.

AppTV é uma skin inspirada na AppleTV para Kodi. Fornece uma GUI bem leve e minimalista ao mesmo empo que permite acesso a inúmeras funções avançadas do Kodinão disponíveis na interface original da AppleTV.

extension.license: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
extension.news: 1.6.0[CR] - Game menu support. Updated a number of Music and Video Views.[CR] - Replace support for NextUp Notification script with Upnext script.[CR] - Numerous fixes to PVR.[CR]

extension.description: Aura is highly customisable skin with multiple widgets and a horizontal home menu. Aura combines the minimalism and rounded edges of Arctic Zephyr with the sleek customisability of Horizon. Whilst the best Aura experience is had with a remote, Aura has been designed to accomodate mouse and touch users where possible.

extension.summary: BOX - Harvesting the power of basics.
extension.description: Inspired by LightBox and nbox, BOX is about providing diversity with consistency. The skin principle is using the same layout and building blocks to display your media in different ways. So it always looks the same but in a different way
extension.license: Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License

extension.summary: Estuary MOD V2 skin by Guilouz
Thème Estuary MOD V2 par Guilouz
extension.description: Estuary MOD V2 is a mod from Estuary by Guilouz for Kodi 18. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Estuary MOD V2 est un mod de Estuary par Guilouz pour Kodi 18. Il est facile à comprendre et à utiliser pour les utilisateurs novices de Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: For better experience, be sure to install all addons required by the theme.
Pour une meilleure expérience, assurez-vous d'installer toutes les extensions requises par le thème.
extension.license: CC BY-SA 4.0, GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.0
